Everybody within an area is subjected to the same illusion: many white feathers fluttering down from the sky. If a given target sees enough of these feathers fall, they will fall into a deep sleep.<ref name="d1"/> Because it's a [[genjutsu]], victims cannot be woken in conventional ways, meaning they will continue to sleep even if extensive combat is going on around them.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 116</ref> Only by dispelling the genjutsu, such as with the [[Genjutsu Cancel]], can victims regain consciousness.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 117</ref> If targets are attentive enough, they can similarly dispel the genjutsu themselves before the feathers have lulled them to sleep.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 114</ref>

== Trivia ==
* In Buddhism, [[wikipedia:Nirvana|Nirvana]] is the complete state of peace, freedom from suffering, and detachment from everything in the material world. It is known as the highest point of meditation.
